welcome:
Welcome! I am the advanced search bot.

Use the following commands:
ğŸ”¹ `/scan domain.com` to search for subdomains.

join_group:
Sorry, you must join the group first to use the bot.
Group link: https://t.me/{group_username}
specify_domain: Please specify a domain. Example: /scan google.com
specify_asn: Please specify an ASN. Example: /asn AS15169
searching_asn: ğŸ” Searching for domains related to {target}...
